document.full_text: ivory coast's alassane ouattara told his presidential rival laurent gbagbo tuesday that an african union offer of a safe exit was his last chance to leave power peacefully.
document.title: gbagbo has last chance for peaceful exit: ouattara
lines_and_colors: ivory coast's alassane ouattara told his presidential rival laurent gbagbo tuesday that an african union offer of a safe exit was his last chance to leave power peacefully.
